actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to grant full credit for military service in the computation of railroad retirement annuities for disability in the case of persons also eligible for pension, compensation, or other benefits as a result of such service.

summary.text: Grants full credit under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 for military service in the computation of railroad retirement annuities for disability in the case of persons also eligible for pension, compensation, or other benefits as a result of such service.

titles.title: A bill to grant full credit for military service in the computation of railroad retirement annuities for disability in the case of persons also eligible for pension, compensation, or other benefits as a result of such service.
